addMedia.description: List of media file paths to add to the device's gallery. Supported mime types are PNG, JPEG, JPG, GIF, and MP4.

oneOf.description: The text to assert visibility for a single view with specific text.

text.description: Text in a view to check visibility.

id.description: ID of a view to check visibility.

enabled.description: True if the view is enabled.

checked.description: True if the view is checked.

focused.description: True if the view has keyboard focus.

selected.description: True if the view is selected.

oneOf.description: Selector object to specify the conditions for visibility.

assertVisible.description: Command to assert whether an element is visible. Can take a string for text or an object with selector parameters.

oneOf.description: The text to assert non-visibility for a single view with specific text.

text.description: Text in a view to check non-visibility.

id.description: ID of a view to check non-visibility.

enabled.description: True if the view is enabled.

checked.description: True if the view is checked.

focused.description: True if the view has keyboard focus.

selected.description: True if the view is selected.

oneOf.description: Selector object to specify the conditions for non-visibility.

assertNotVisible.description: Command to assert whether an element is not visible. Can take a string for text or an object with selector parameters.

oneOf.description: A JavaScript expression to assert its truthiness.

condition.description: A JavaScript expression to assert its truthiness.

label.description: A label to describe the assertion, typically for debugging or failure messages.

oneOf.description: An object defining a JavaScript expression to assert and an optional label.

assertTrue.description: Command to assert whether a given value is true, non-empty, or truthy.

back.description: Command to navigate the user to the previous screen (Android-only).
